refnamediv.refpurpose: display a histogram of a black and white bw file on a framebuffer

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Bwhist displays a histogram of the pixel values in a bw5 format file. If a file is not given, standard input is read. The output will be displayed on the frambuffer selected via the FB_FILE environment variable (see libfb3).

The relative frequency is displayed on the x axis scaled so that the maximum is full screen. The value 0 is at the bottom of the screen, 255 is at the top.
The output is overlaid on whatever is currently on the display.
The -v flag will output the histogram values on the terminal.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: This program assumes it has at least 512 lines in y to work with.
